title: Council Directive 81/36/EEC of 9 February 1981 amending Annex II to Directive 76/895/EEC relating to the fixing of maximum levels for pesticide residues in and on fruit and vegetables
header:
COUNCIL DIRECTIVE of 9 February 1981 amending Annex II to Directive 76/895/EEC relating to the fixing of maximum levels for pesticide residues in and on fruit and vegetables (81/36/EEC)
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
Annex II to Directive 76/895/EEC shall be amended as follows:
(1) OJ No L 340, 9.12.1976, p. 26.  (2) OJ No L 102, 19.4.1980, p. 26.     1. The provisions concerning dimethoate and omethoate shall be replaced by the following: >PIC FILE= "T0020163">
2. Footnote (3) shall be deleted.

Member States shall bring into force the laws, regulations and administrative provisions necessary to comply with this Directive not later than 1 January 1982. They shall forthwith inform the Commission thereof.
This Directive is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 9 February 1981.
For the Council
The President
G. BRAKS
